movies.title: Indrivaren
movies.plot: Isabelle and Pontus pass out as police officers but he is dismayed when she says she wants to put their affair on hold in order to travel.Her plans are cut short when she joins the investigation into the death of her friend from the gym,Therese,murdered by burglars. Therese's loser ex-boyfriend Fabian is in debt to very heavy people and offers them her jewels but is he the killer? Violent boxer and ex-con Patrik Lippowski,a former lover of Isabelle,who fled from him and changed her name from Rebecka to Isabelle to escape him,is another suspect,but he is murdered with Isabelle's gun. In finding the killer Pontus's love for Isabelle is put to the test whilst Wallander advises Katarina when her bitchy teen-aged daughter starts stealing.
movies.simplePlot: Isabelle and Pontus pass out as police officers but he is dismayed when she says she wants to put their affair on hold in order to travel.Her plans are cut short when she joins the ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Lena Endre was born on July 8, 1955 in Härnösand, Västernorrlands län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009). She was previously married to Richard Hobert, Thomas Hanzon, Vjeko Benzon and Malte Ekblom.
biography.name: Lena Endre

biography.bio: Sverrir Gudnason was born on September 12, 1978. He is an actor, known for Valse pour Monica (2013), Gentlemen (2014) and Blowfly Park (2014).
biography.name: Sverrir Gudnason

biography.bio: Nina Zanjani was born on September 1, 1981 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mind the Gap (2007), Balls (2010) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Nina Zanjani

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Henny Åman is an actress, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Henny Åman

biography.bio: Emil Forselius was born on November 23, 1974 in Västervik, Kalmar län, Sweden. He was an actor, known for Tic Tac (1997), White Water Fury (2000) and Deadline Torp (2005). He died on March 2, 2010 in Södermalm, Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden.
biography.name: Emil Forselius

biography.bio: David Dencik was born on October 31, 1974 in Sweden as Karl David Sebastian Dencik. He is an actor, known for La taupe (2011), The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011) and The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009).
biography.name: David Dencik

biography.bio: Started out as a figurant at 17 in Ingmar Bergmans production of King Lear at the Royal Swedish Dramaten Theatre in Stockholm, Sweden. Prior to that he had no acting experience at all. He grew up thinking ice hockey would be the game of his life. Moved to New York, USA to take acting lessons and lived abroad for ten years. Moved back to Sweden and started to work full time as an actor in several films and plays and has lately pursued yet another of his dreams, to direct both Films and Theatre. He has also written many screenplays and two have become feature films: Completely Mad and Babas Cars, that he directed. He remarried Daga Lamy (Edholm) and has one son from former marriage. He plays Ice hockey in team Salming with ice hockey legend Borje Salming as team captain. The future lies ahead...
biography.name: Rafael Edholm

biography.bio: Fredrik Hiller was born on August 20, 1970 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor and director, known for Beowulf (2007), Frank (2002) and Love and War (2006).
biography.name: Fredrik Hiller

biography.bio: Robin Stegmar is an actor, known for Patrik, Age 1.5 (2008), The Invisible (2002) and En decemberdröm (2005).
biography.name: Robin Stegmar
